pageProduct.name: Avene A Oxitive Night Peeling Cream 30ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Eau Thermale Avène A-Oxitive Night Peeling Cream works through the night to boost cellular activity, detoxify and even out skin texture, preserving youthful skin thanks to a night renewing complex of active ingredients:
- Gradual Release Vitamin A (Retinaldehyde): boosts cellular activity, refines the skin’s texture and evens the skin tone. Reduces fine lines and wrinkles.
- Gradual Release Vitamin E (Pre-tocopheryl): fights against free radicals, powerful antioxidant
- Evening primrose oil: sourced from the small seeds of the plant, commonly known as “evening star”, whose flowers open only at dusk, rich in fatty acids and vitamins, helps nourish the skin and restore its balance

Equivalent to 3 peel sessions*

*Comparative clinical study under dermatological control - 56 subjects - 1 application of A-Oxitive Peeling cream every evening for 8 weeks vs 3 Glycolic acid peel sessions (20%/50%/70%).

Common Uses

For tired skin, dull complexion, fine lines and wrinkles, uneven skin texture. For all types of sensitive skin
